infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Jag GeoTag needs camera access to take photos with location.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Jag GeoTag uses your location to tag photos with exact coordinates.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Jag GeoTag saves geo-tagged photos to your library.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow Jag GeoTag to access your camera to take geo-tagged photos.
plugins.microphonePermission: Allow Jag GeoTag to access your microphone for video (optional).

plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Jag GeoTag uses your location to tag photos with date, time, and exact coordinates (latitude, longitude, accuracy).
